=== How to install a translation ===

 # [http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=44374 Download] a translation variant.
 # Extract archive into folder `/gw_locale'. Use a tool like [http://7-zip.org/ 7-Zip] to extract archive files.

For example, to add Spanish translation, download file `glossword.1.8.x.es-utf8.zip' 
and place all files from archive to `/gw_locale/es-utf8'.

The translation will appear the list of interface languages.
